sentences.english: I want to play table-tennis. Do you want to join me ? No, I'm doing exercises.
sentences.chinese: 我想打乒乓球。你想加入我吗？不，我正在做操。

sentences.english: My friend likes playing Ping-pong and playing the violin.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友喜欢打乒乓球和拉小提琴。

sentences.english: Following Nixon's visit to China, the Chinese team came to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松访华后，中国乒乓球队回访了美国。

sentences.english: Philately pingpong roller skating reading and music.
sentences.chinese: 集邮乒乓球轮滑读书和音乐。

sentences.english: Liu Guoliang a very good Ping- Pong player.
sentences.chinese: 刘国梁曾经是一位出色的乒乓球运动员。

sentences.english: In your spare time, you can play basketball, pingpong and so on.
sentences.chinese: 在你的空闲时间，你可以打篮球，乒乓球等等。

sentences.english: In This paper discusses the fact that it is a trend accordance with the table tennis law that sportswoman has manlike technology.
sentences.chinese: 女子技术男性化是一个符合乒乓球运动规律的趋势。

sentences.english: Jane paired off with Alice in a table tennis doubles match.
sentences.chinese: 在乒乓球双打比赛中简与爱丽丝配对。

sentences.english: Table tennis is our national sport which gets most of the attention of the nation. It's very popular.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓球是我们的国球，在全国备受瞩目，相当流行。

sentences.english: My CCA (Co-Curricular Activity) is Table Tennis.
sentences.chinese: 我的课外活动是乒乓球。

sentences.english: The hobby each sports excel at the pingpong and the badminton .
sentences.chinese: 爱好各项体育运动擅长乒乓球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: He was the No. 1 seed in the table-tennis championship.
sentences.chinese: 他是这届乒乓球锦标赛头号种子选手。

sentences.english: The Ping-Pong tables, soda machines, and lots of music.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓球，汽水贩卖机，热闹的音乐。

sentences.english: You can go to the store with me to purchase pingpong bats and balls.
sentences.chinese: 我可以和你一起去买乒乓球拍和球。

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and playing ping-pong.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打篮球和打乒乓球。
